page.title: 16PRIMARY SCHOOL; PLUMSTEAD
page.content:
Bannockburn School is a nice quiet school. We learn to play instruments like guitars,trumpets and recorders. And we work very hard every day. We do Maths, Handwriting and English. We have to read or we'll be in trouble with my teacher. Most children really like doing art work and doing a nice project on something. We sometimes even go out for an outing to museums, seasides and good places like that. When we leave the school and go to our secondary school they give us something to remember the old school like a book.
Labchandra.
